summary: A configuration container that holds all hyperparameters and architectural settings for a BlenderbotSmall transformer model, such as vocabulary size, hidden dimensions, number of encoder/decoder layers, attention heads, feed‑forward sizes, activation functions, dropout rates, positional limits, initialization scale, layer‑drop probabilities, embedding scaling, caching behavior, and forced EOS token handling. It inherits from a generic pretrained configuration class and is used to instantiate a model with a reproducible architecture.
business_intent: Provide a flexible, user‑configurable way to define and reproduce the exact architecture of a BlenderbotSmall conversational model, enabling easy model creation, customization, and downstream fine‑tuning.
